data_table.description: ECG Composite 12 Lead, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ECGMD07
variable.description: Recording time [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD04
variable.description: Filter setting - not used - blank [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD08
variable.description: Quality grade (Noise/mm, overall drift/mm, beat to beat drift/mm) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD57
variable.description: V3 ECG sent to Minn [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD58
variable.description: V4 ECG abnormal sent [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD60
variable.description: V4 - not significant - random sample [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD30
variable.description: CIIs value [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD32
variable.description: Q or QS amplitude: I [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD33
variable.description: Q or QS amplitude: III [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD09
variable.description: Minnesota code L1 (Q-Q.S. pattern I, aVL, V6) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead a VL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec lead I or V6
Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3 between V5 and V6. (All beats in lead V5 must have an initial R > 2 mm.)
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: ECGMD10
variable.description: Minnesota code F1 (Q-Q.S. pattern II, III, aVF) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD11
variable.description: Minnesota code V1 (Q-Q.S. pattern V1-V5) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD12
variable.description: Minnesota code L4 (ST junction & segment depression I, aVL, V6) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
Missing
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ECGMD13
variable.description: Minnesota code F4 (ST junction & segment depression II, III, aVF) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ECGMD14
variable.description: Minnesota code V4 (ST junction & segment depression V1-V5) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5

variable.name: ECGMD15
variable.description: Minnesota code L5 (T wave I, aVL, V6) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in either of leads I, V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGMD16
variable.description: Minnesota code F5 (T wave II, III, aVF) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Missing
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not Coded in lead aVF
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in lead II; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGMD17
variable.description: Minnesota code V5 (T wave V1-V5) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude negative (flat), or diphasic (negative-positive or positive-negative type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm, in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase, in any of leads V3 - V5
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3, V4, V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGMD18
variable.description: Minnesota code L92 (ST segment elevation anterolateral site (leads I, aVL, V6)) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent

variable.name: ECGMD19
variable.description: Minnesota code F92 (ST segment elevation posterior (inferior) site (leads II, III, aVF)) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF

variable.name: ECGMD20
variable.description: Minnesota code V92 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation more or equal to 2.0 mm in any of leads V1 - V4

variable.name: ECGMD21
variable.description: Minnesota code C2 (QRS axis deviation codes) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent

Right (optional code when 2-2 is not present). QRS axis from +90o through +119o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be zero or negative in I and positive in II and III.)
Missing
Missing

Left. QRS axis from -30o through -90o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be zero or positive in I, negative in III, and zero or negative in II.)

Right. QRS axis from +120o through -150o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be negative in I, and zero or positive in III, and in I must be one-half or more of that in III.)

variable.name: ECGMD22
variable.description: Minnesota code C3 (high amplitude R wave codes) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Right: R amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm and R amplitude more or equal to S amplitude in the majority of beats in lead V1, when S amplitude is > R amplitude somewhere to the left on the chest of V1
Missing
Missing
Missing

Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL. (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Right: R amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm and R amplitude more or equal to S amplitude in the majority of beats in lead V1, when S amplitude is > R amplitude somewhere to the left on the chest of V1 (codes 7-3 and 3-2, if criteria for both are present)

variable.name: ECGMD23
variable.description: Minnesota code C6 (A-V conduction defect codes) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Missing
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Artificial pacemaker
Missing

Wolff-Parkinson-White Pattern (WPW), persistent. Sinus P-wave. P-R interval < 0.12 sec, plus QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec, plus R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec, coexisting in the same beat and present in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, aVL, V4, V5, V6

variable.name: ECGMD24
variable.description: Minnesota code C7 (ventricular conduction defect) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Missing
Missing
Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any cod able Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

Complete left bundle branch block (LBBB). (Do not code in presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus R peak duration equal to 0.06 sec in a majority of beats (of the sam

Complete right bundle branch block (RBBB). (Do not code in the presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus: R' > R in V1 or V2; or QRS mainly upright, with R peak

variable.name: ECGMD25
variable.description: Minnesota code C91 (low QRS amplitude) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1 - V6. (Check calibration before coding.)

variable.name: ECGMD34
variable.description: Q or QS amplitude: V5 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD35
variable.description: Q or QS amplitude: V6 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD36
variable.description: R amplitude: I [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD37
variable.description: R amplitude: III [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD38
variable.description: R amplitude: aVL [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD39
variable.description: R amplitude: V2 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD40
variable.description: R amplitude: V5 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD41
variable.description: R amplitude: V6 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD42
variable.description: S amplitude: I [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD43
variable.description: S amplitude: III [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD44
variable.description: S amplitude: V1 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD45
variable.description: S amplitude: V2 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD46
variable.description: S amplitude: V5 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD47
variable.description: S amplitude: V6 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD48
variable.description: T negative amplitude: aVL [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD49
variable.description: T negative amplitude: aVF [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD50
variable.description: T negative amplitude: V6 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD51
variable.description: T positive amplitude: aVR [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD52
variable.description: T positive amplitude: V1 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD53
variable.description: T positive amplitude: V6 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMDCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD31
variable.description: Heart rate [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD54
variable.description: QRS interval [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD55
variable.description: OE measurement [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD56
variable.description: OV6 measurement [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]

variable.name: ECGMD26
variable.description: Minnesota code C93 (P-wave amplitude > 2.5 MM in any of leads II, III, aVF in majority of beats) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats

variable.name: ECGMD27
variable.description: Minnesota code C94 (QRS transition zone) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
QRS transition zone at V3 or to the right of V3 on the chest. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)
QRS transition zone at V4 or to the left of V4 on the chest. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ECGMD28
variable.description: Minnesota code C95 (T-wave amplitude) [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ECGMD29
variable.description: Minnesota code E7 [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
QRS duration > 90 MS or intrinscord deflection V5 or V6 > 50 MS

variable.name: ECGMDFLG
variable.description: ECGMD record present [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
variable.value: Presence

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [ECG Composite 12 Lead (with adjudications as needed) (ECGMD41), exam 4]
